social_posts.post_text:
Douching 101 w/ @jeffreybchapman & @blakeyoungfountain from @patrikianpolk 2012 film “The Skinny”

#lgbt #gaycinema #theskinny #patrikianpolk

🤦🏾‍♂️ Looking back on past work, I often blanche at the raunchy boldness of some of my dialogue. But when creating, my main mantra is “Don’t think about the reaction to the work- say what needs to be said, without fear or hesitation. If you blink, you fail. So don’t blink, bitch.” Me. Im the bitch I be talkin’ to. I wrote the scene I wish I had lived.—Practically speaking, anyone interested in anal sex needs the information. And it’s a funny scene— because @blakeyoungfountain & @jeffreybchapman absolutely kill it of course, but also because it makes me so uncomfortable to watch…still. DISCLAIMER: it is not good to do the heavy duty back door irrigation regularly— you rid the area of all the good stuff it needs to do what it do. But if you’re preparing for those XXL appendages…you get my drift. But if you eat a reasonably healthy diet and avoid processed foods, you should be fine with a simple douche bulb. But if you’re scoffing down oxtails, gumbo & Taco Hell, then you know what to do. #TheSkinny #analsëx #analsex #analsexy #analsexisgood

Tyre Nichols… Repost from @amandaseales
•
❤️✊🏽 (don’t come in here with “he didn’t have to be a great person in order not to die. That is OBVIOUS. However, if he WAS a great person then it shall be stated and shouldn’t be diminished for a political message.

Repost @stephenwintersir
• Patrik Polk, 🎥👑 @patrikianpolk January 30, 2023. @thekindsage, vegan eatery in Echo Park

HONORED TO BE HONORED! —Repost from @wespeakoutusa •👂 the man behind the iconic show #NoahsArc @patrikianpolk and his why. He is this year’s “Lifetime Achievement” recipient at the I AM Awards on April 22, 2023 in Washington DC.
. 
🎫 link in the @wespeakoutusa bio. Interview clip from #VisibleOutOnTV @AppleTV documentary series, featuring @darrylstephens 💕
Celine Dion with A WORD for all parents. “Let people be who they are as quick and as soon as possible.”

Maurice Jamal. Speak his name. After I created and produced the Noah’s Arc short films and eventually the pilot (2004), hot on my heels was Maurice Jamal. I remember him telling me- during one of the many trips where Noah’s Arc and Maurice’s first film THE SKI TRIP (2004) were on screening tours together- how my film PUNKS (2000) inspired him to make his bold, brash and hilarious films. His next effort, the incredible DIRTY LAUNDRY (2006), even starred one of PUNKS’ leading men, the amazing Rockmond Dunbar as well as the incredible, legendary Loretta Devine, who also appeared in both films. Sure, we had a healthy (and sometimes unhealthy) rivalry— we were two black gay men after all lol. But I’m glad to say, it was mostly healthy. We cheered each other on and delighted in each others successes. Maurice was a bold risk-taker and trailblazer. I will never forget his work in front of and behind the camera on the Chapelle Show. And in 2010, he founded GLO TV, the first urban LGBTQ network! Imagine having the guts and gumption to do THAT. Like me & my early work, Maurice was ahead of his time. And once he emerged on the scene, I was thrilled to no longer be the only one. It’s sad to see friends and colleagues make their transition into the hereafter. But this one really hits home. Please, I beg you…Remember, Maurice. He deserves that. #mauricejamal #dirtylaundry #theskitrip

💕 REPOST: @nathanhwilliams
• This FBF is a @patrikianpolk appreciation & celebration post. I have been planning to do this post for about a week because tomorrow Patrik will receive a Lifetime Achievement Award at the “I Am” Awards in DC. 

Notably for his body of work that includes creating the iconic series, “Noah’s Arc,” his groundbreaking Sundance-winning film, “Punks,” as well as his work on the hit shows and films, “PValley,” “Being Mary Jane,” “The Skinny,” & “Blackbird.”

Without question, Patrik is a trailblazing legend and beyond deserving of this award. BUT, I wanna talk about my friend & Brother PIP. 

We met 20 years ago while he was promoting Noah’s Arc & we were promoting The Ski Trip at the Black Prides across the country. There was no LOGO-TV or any other outlets that were available to us so we took it to the audience directly. 

For the past 20 years, I have watched this man create something from nothing. I have watched this man persevere when ALL of the chips were stacked against him. I have watched this man be resilient in an industry that doesn’t respect Black gay narratives the way it should. I’ve watched this man shake off the fact that his contemporaries (white) get 7 & 8 figure deals. I have watched this man raise his level of excellence with each stroke of the pen and with each project. 

Pat, you are an inspiration to our community and to ANY creator, particularly ones of color. You stare the so-called limits placed on us down the barrel and CREATE! For us! And you deserve every bit of the recognition you’re receiving this weekend and then some. 

I am proud of you! I am energized by you! I am grateful to know you! I love you! Congrats!!!!!

They say the people that blaze the trail rarely get to enjoy the paved road, but I am so glad that is becoming untrue for you. 

And, I know you’re just getting warmed up. So here’s some 🌺🌸🌹 for the first half. Expecting some 💎 for the second. Let’s GO! You ole “Tall Skinny Black Boy.” Love, NHW
____________________
#patrikianpolk #noahsarc #iamawards #trailblazer #lgbtq #black #nativeson #blackmen

Guess the cats outta the bag. —Repost @gayemagazine
• #Breaking - Gayes, this is not a drill! 😩 TV & film director Patrik-Ian Polk has officially confirmed that his hit series “Noah’s Arc” will be returning this year! 

“I am very happy to confirm that there is indeed more Noah’s Arc coming,” said Polk during his lifetime achievement award acceptance speech at the 2023  @wespeakoutusa “I Am” Awards in D.C. last night.

Gaye Magazine exclusively reported that the cast would reunite at the awards for Polk to receive his award. (Read Our Previous Coverage at #GayeMagazine.com!)
#noahsarc

💕Still pinching myself. There’s something about watching a video highlighting your entire career that is just…humbling to say the least. Anyone who knows me well knows I always keep my head down, focusing on the work at hand. I rarely look back to say “I did that!“ Always too busy saying “OK, bitch, what’s next?” Big thank you to @wespeakoutusa for forcing me to take a moment and receive these beautiful flowers. Thank you to the cast of #NOAHSARC for honoring me. Thank you to my Cooper & Polk family and close friends who came out to support. Special shout out to Dwight ONeal  @onealappeal & Lindsey Seide @filmgeek15 for putting together such a lovely and touching tribute video. This was a weekend I will never forget. —REPOST from @gayemagazine • #Exclusive - The Icon and Father of Black Gay Cinema himself Patrik-Ian Polk accepted his Lifetime Achievement Award last night! Watch his “I AM” Awards tribute reel video! 

Congratulations @patrikianpolk 🎬🤩🎈Gaye Magazine loves and adores you! Thank you for your leadership! ♥️

Read our coverage of his announcement to reboot Noah’s Arc and view exclusive photos at #GayeMagazine.com! 

🎥: Courtesy of @wespeakoutusa / Edited by - Lindsey Seïde @filmgeek15

The 15th Anniversary COVID reunion special, "NOAH'S ARC: THE RONA CHRONICLES" is now up on my @Youtube channel (Patrik-Ian Polk Entertainment). In case you missed it, get yo' life! Link in my bio! Music: @fol_chen & @bingworld_international
NOAH’S ARC: THE RONA CHRONICLES is streaming on my @Youtube channel— Patrik-Ian Polk Entertainment. Link in my bio.
NOAH’S ARC seasons 1 & 2 are now streaming on @paramountplus!!! Get your life and relive the magic! Are y’all ready for the next chapter? #noahsarc
Sooooo excited for @thelivingmichaeljackson’s new musical WHITE GIRL IN DANGER!!! #whitegirlindanger
Happy birthday (May 10th) to the Muva of PVALLEY! The Pulitzer, Olivier & Image Award-winning @katorihall! Love you, sista!

30 second video: So the wonderful folk over at @pynksundayradio are in the middle of screening and discussing the entire Noah’s Arc series and movie. Here they are discussing a moment from our 15th anniversary reunion special., THE RONA CHRONICLES— which you can view in its entirety on the Patrik Ian Polk Entertainment @YouTube page. There should be a link in my bio. Enjoy 😅

Don’t mind me. Just over here being a Black Queer Icon. 😝 Thank you @pynksundayradio for highlighting our wonderful @pvalleystarz as well as shining lights on other queer Black stories!— REPOST:  @pynksundayradio #BlackQueerIconOfTheWeek Happy Pride Month Y’all‼️ To celebrate Pride Month 2023, PSR presents our new series ⤵️

Happy Pride! I am so excited to be honored at the Native Son Awards 2023 on Friday, June 16, 2023, in New York City celebrating Black Queer Excellence. @nativesonnow  Check them out at the awards website —nativesonawards.rsvpify.com. And scroll to the last slide for the after party info (Jewel Thief— 30 W 30TH ST NY 10001, 9pm-2am)! #nativesonawards #NativeSon Awards #OurVoice #OurStory #OurPower #NativeSon
@hollywoodreporter’s new PRIDE issue features a nice write-up on yours truly. I’ll try to post the link in my bio— if my technologically challenged azz can figure out how.

This heffa did not need the Supreme Court to keep us away from her shitty ass 1997 websites. No gay couple in their right minds would EVER! 😂 This week has been rough, and I for sure needed this laugh.— REPOST @herrerashow on Lorie’s privilegeD. #SupremeCourt #Queer #LGBTQ #karen
BRILLIANT: “This was for a [blind] man named Andy who asked for a bit more detail to make up for what he couldn’t see. Andy really liked it.” —Bravo! @notwildlin #montgomeryteaparty #alabamateaparty
Take 2: Merry Christmas from wintery North Berwick Beach in Scotland.

Devastated to learn of the passing of my longtime Seattle friend Jeff Hobbs aka @jackebrown. Even more gutted that I did not know he was in so much pain. I hope his soul is at peace and he is resting with his mother, whom he missed dearly. Wish I had another chance to tell him how special he was to me and how appreciative I was for his friendship and unfailing support over the last two decades. This photo was taken in 2000. He will be missed. Check on your friends and loved ones. 💔
Producer/Writer/Director: @noahsarctv @PValleyStarz @shothechi @betmaryjane @blkbirdthefilm @theskinnymovie. Hollywood Reporter article—>
